# Interact (cont.): Cu + D-penicilamine vs Cu {#dpen_vs_cu_interaction_2}

```{r include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = FALSE)

```

```{r include=FALSE}

# Load data
source("./scripts/0_meta_env_prep.R")
source("./scripts/0_bookdown_helper.R")

enrichments_camera <- readRDS(file.path('output',
                                      'data_enrichment',
                                      'camera',
                                      "camera_all.RDS"))

fit_contrasts <- readRDS(file = file.path("output",
                                          "data_expression",
                                          "post_DGE",
                                          "fit_contrasts.RDS"))

# Set comparison coefficient

coef_x <- 3
coef_y <- 8

```

## XY plot

WT on x-axis, KO on y-axis

```{r out.width = "80%"}

plot_XY(fit_contrasts,
        coef_x = coef_x,
        coef_y = coef_y,
        xlab = colnames(fit_contrasts$contrasts)[coef_x],
        ylab = colnames(fit_contrasts$contrasts)[coef_y]
        )

```
